add-an-image-to-pdf-with-alt-text-rollou.userFacingName: Add an Image to PDF (with Alt Text) - Rollout
add-an-image-to-pdf-with-alt-text-rollou.userFacingDescription: One of the important features users need when managing their PDF files is adding an image. Users want an easy way to add an image to their PDF documents that they can easily resize and move around the document. This experiment measures the impact of launching this feature for Firefox users and if that impacts their usage in any way. Specifically, we are trying to understand the impact on Firefox Daily Active Users (DAU) as a result of launching this feature.

csv-import-release-rollout.userFacingDescription: This rollout enables users to import logins from a CSV file from the about:logins page.

ech-roll-out.userFacingDescription: Encrypted Client Hello is a new TLS feature which provides greater privacy for HTTPS connections.

mozillaaccounts-toolbar-button-default-v.userFacingName: MozillaAccounts toolbar button default visibility rollout
mozillaaccounts-toolbar-button-default-v.userFacingDescription: This experiment measures the impact of showing the Firefox Accounts toolbar button by default for signed-out users.

upgrade-spotlight-rollout.userFacingDescription: Experimenting on onboarding content when you upgrade Firefox.

mixed-content-level-2-roll-out-release-1.userFacingDescription: This feature is making browsing more secure by upgrading HTTP connections to HTTPs for mixed content.

phc-rollout.userFacingDescription: Roll out the Probabilistic Heap Checker in Firefox Release.

pocket-newtab-3rd-sponsored-tile-rollout.userFacingName: Showing 3rd sponsored tile on the newtab page (Rollout)
pocket-newtab-3rd-sponsored-tile-rollout.userFacingDescription: Rollout adding an additional sponsored topsite tile in new tab.

highlighting-in-pdfs-rollout.userFacingDescription: Feature to highlight text and other content in PDFs

long-term-holdback-2024-h1-velocity-desk.userFacingName: Long term holdback 2024 H1 Velocity Desktop
long-term-holdback-2024-h1-velocity-desk.userFacingDescription: Long-term holdback for H1 Velocity experiments

$l10n.comment: The title “Search smarter, not harder” is a play on an English phrase that may not translate to other languages. An alternative to this title for translation is “Search more efficiently.”

$l10n.text: Find everything here, from the most relevant results to sites you’ve bookmarked and visited before.
$l10n.comment: The subtitle of the callout calling attention to the search bar

discovery-of-search-sap-early-day-it-de-.userFacingName: Discovery of Search SAP Early Day IT-DE-FR
discovery-of-search-sap-early-day-it-de-.userFacingDescription: This experiment displays a message that informs the user that they can use the URL bar to search the internet without having to first navigate to a search site.

de.find-faster-subtitle: Starten Sie Ihre Suche hier, um schnell Ergebnisse zu erhalten, einschließlich Websites, die Sie als Lesezeichen gespeichert und zuvor besucht haben.
de.search-once-subtitle: Erhalten Sie hier relevante Suchvorschläge sowie Ergebnisse, die auf zuvor besuchten und Lesezeichen gespeicherten Websites basieren.
de.search-smarter-subtitle: Hier finden Sie alles, von den relevantesten Ergebnissen bis zu Websites, die Sie als Lesezeichen gespeichert und bereits besucht haben.

fr.find-faster-title: Vos recherches en un clin d’œil
fr.search-once-title: Une seule recherche pour tout trouver
fr.find-faster-subtitle: Lancez votre recherche ici pour obtenir rapidement des résultats, notamment des sites que vous avez ajoutés aux marque-pages et visités auparavant.
fr.search-once-subtitle: Obtenez des suggestions de recherche pertinentes ici ainsi que des résultats selon des sites que vous avez déjà visités et que vous avez ajoutés à vos marque-pages.
fr.search-smarter-subtitle: Trouvez tout ici, des résultats les plus pertinents aux sites que vous avez ajouté à vos marque-pages ou que vous avez déjà visités.

it.find-faster-title: Trova più velocemente quello che ti serve
it.find-faster-subtitle: Inizia la tua ricerca qui per ottenere rapidamente risultati. Verranno inclusi i siti che hai aggiunto ai segnalibri o visitato in passato.
it.search-once-subtitle: Qui puoi ottenere suggerimenti di ricerca pertinenti, oltre a risultati basati sui siti che hai visitato o aggiunto ai segnalibri.
it.search-smarter-subtitle: Qui puoi trovare tutto, dai risultati più pertinenti ai siti che hai aggiunto ai segnalibri o visitato in passato.
